title: Longguo & Shihyun
text: Longguo & Shihyun (<a href="Hangul">Hangul</a>: 용국 & 시현) is a South Korean duo formed by Choon Entertainment in <a href="Seoul">Seoul</a>, South Korea. The duo previously participated in "<a href="Produce%20101%20Season%202">Produce 101 Season 2</a>". They debuted on July 31, 2017, with the single "the.the.the". Longguo was a member of fan-made project boy group <a href="JBJ%20%28band%29">JBJ</a>, having signed a seven-month contract with the label <a href="LOEN%20Entertainment">Fave Entertainment</a>.
